services.title: Our Services
services.description: We provide a wide range of professional services to ensure financial transparency, tax compliance, and efficient accounting.

audit.title: Audit
audit.description1:
The purpose of the audit of the financial
statements is the independent review of the
company’s financial statements, to ensure that
they are true, accurate and matching with
applicable legal and accounting standards.
audit.description2:
During the audit not only the financial
statements are checked, but also the internal
system of control, which helps to identify the
possible mistakes, violations and frauds.
audit.description3:
The main objectives of the audit of the financial
statements include:

point1.title: Confirmation of reliability of financial statements
point1.text: The auditor checks whether the company’s financial statements are correctly composed and whether they reflect the real financial state and the results of the activity.

point2.title: Compliance with laws and standards
point2.text: The auditors check the compliance with international or other accounting standards, as well as country laws.

point3.title: Evaluation of internal control effectiveness
point3.text: The audit can reveal the weaknesses of the internal control system, which can lead to financial risks or violations.

point4.title: Disclosure of possible risks and fraud
point4.text: The auditors can detect suspicious transactions, which may indicate fraud or other financial violations.

point5.title: Providing confidence to interested parties
point5.text:
The financial audit helps shareholders, investors,
creditors and other interested parties to have
confidence in the reliability of the financial data,
on the base of which they make their decisions.

audit.conclusion: Thus, audit plays an important role in ensuring the transparency and reliability of a company’s financial statements.

consulting.title: Consulting and Tax Audit
consulting.description1: Consulting services provided by us mainly include the areas of finance, tax, and management.
consulting.description2:
Frequently changing legislation is common to the tax
system of the Republic of Armenia, which is often
unclear and is the reason of various interpretations.
Taxes need to be investigated by relevant competent
authorities, which are legally entitled to impose
sanctions (fines, penalties) on business entities and
their officials for violating the legislation.
consulting.description3:
Under these conditions, there is a risk that additional
tax liabilities may arise as a result of inspections by
the competent authorities, so it is especially
important to provide businessmen with detailed
advice on tax legislation, which allows to reduce the
above-mentioned risks as much as possible, as well
as to be oriented when evaluating the effectiveness
of business investments.
consulting.description4:
We help companies avoid tax risks and fines as much
as possible, provide recommendations on tax
optimization and correct presentation of tax
calculations and reports.

accounting.title: Accounting

complex accounting and tax accounting problems.
